Initializer# init(fovY:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
init(
    fovY: Angle2DFloat,
    aspectRatio: Float,
    nearZ: Float,
    farZ: Float,
    reverseZ: Bool
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3DFloat/init(fovY:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:)#parameters)

`fovY`The field of view angle on the @p y axis.

`aspectRatio`The aspect ratio.

`nearZ`The near @p z .

`farZ`The far @p z .

`reverseZ`A Boolean value that specifies whether the matrix should use reverse z.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3DFloat/init(fovY:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:)#return-value)

A projective transform with right-hand side perspective.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3DFloat/init(fovY:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:)#discussion)

Returns a projective transform with right-hand side perspective.
